response.original_title: George Civeris: A Sense of Urgency
response.overview: In this sharp and surreal stand-up special, George Civeris riffs on the child he'll never raise, the Shakespearian nature of straight weddings, and our equine savior. It's hilariously personal, fully absurdist, and oddly poetic.
response.title: George Civeris: A Sense of Urgency
